name: Siege Bots
description:
Build, Design, and Conquer!

Siege Bots lets you build your own robots from the ground up. Everything from appearance and weaponry to making your own Artificial Intelligence.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SiegeBot

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SiegeBotsGame/
